channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 Best MLB Free Agent Fits for Edwin Diaz if he Leaves the New York Mets
item.description: If Edwin Diaz leaves the New York Mets, here are the three best MLB free agent fits for the hard-throwing closer.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 12: Lines, Spreads for all 14 Games

item.title: Missouri HC Eli Drinkwitz on Coaching Rumors: 'This Stuff is Just a Distraction'
item.description: Missouri Tigers head coach Eli Drinkwitz said that speculation about his potential departure "is just a distraction."

item.title: Anthony Yarde hoping third time's a charm in David Benavidez world title showdown
item.description: Yarde insists he will be better in his third attempt at winning a world light heavyweight title.

item.title: MMA P4P rankings: Shevchenko, Makhachev new No. 1s -- but just one unanimous
item.description: Winners of the two UFC 322 title bouts move to the top of the ESPN pound-for-pound rankings.

item.title: Statement win over Uruguay shows the USMNT has come a long way in 16 months
item.description: Sixteen months ago, the U.S. men's national team hit rock bottom, losing 1-0 to Uruguay to seal its group-stage elimination from the 2024 Copa America...

item.title: Why Haney is in an unusual spot heading into the Norman fight
item.description: Devin Haney is only 26, a pound-for-pound talent and unbeaten. So why is he facing a crossroads fight against Brian Norman Jr.?

item.title: Ranked: All 64 national teams that can still win the 2026 World Cup after latest eliminations
item.description: There are still 64 national teams that can win the FIFA World Cup next summer. Let's go through them all and rank where they stand.
